item.description:
Let's start the weekend off early and join the CT & NY Singles for a jazzy evening out on the patio at the Tuscan Oven. From 5 - 7 they have happy hour with $3.00 beers, $5.00 glasses of wine and $5.00 well drinks. We can mix and mingle, sip and savor the appetizers in a delightful setting.

From 7:30 to 10:30 we can enjoy some live jazz. No cover charge!
item.how_to_find_us: We are meeting the NY, CT Singles. look for the meetup signs on the patio.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Jazzing it up at the Tuscan Oven
